name: Zuzalu Townhall Activation
description: In this video, the speaker discusses the Zolomstack and how people can contribute to it. They plan to have regular town halls and deeper discussions about specific aspects of Zolomst. They also want to create specific working groups for people who care about or have suggestions in specific areas such as health, online tools, future scaling, and location and tech logistics. The speaker also talks about the Hackathon focus and how they plan to empower builders with tools and have a public goods funding round. They also discuss community technical infrastructure and how they want to support more people to build on top of or alongside existing infrastructure. The Zolomstack passport is mentioned as a simple application that stores a ZK friendly key pair for all Zolom residents and visitors that can be used to authenticate into other services or build on top of.
